name: Zen Garden
summary: Design and rake Zen Garden’s in relaxing soundscape locations. Go inside your garden and experience it full size. You have only one problem. The rocks are haunted! Battle Yokai and bring peace to your garden. Unlock garden treasure items. Relax in soundscapes, on the viewing platform, take a walk with AI, or choose a place to sit. Let your mind wander with the visualizer. A timer tells you when to get back to reality.
